医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究揭示了糖尿病和糖尿病肾病的肠肾轴研究人员探索肠道微生物群组成，以评估微生物与糖尿病临床表型之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/New-research-sheds-light-on-gut-kidney-axis-in-diabetes-and-diabetic-nephropathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/New-research-sheds-light-on-gut-kidney-axis-in-diabetes-and-diabetic-nephropathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51b6a126-bc40-4dd4-9e59-ad8643d85d5f Wed, 02 Aug 2023 08:20:00 -0400 New research sheds light on gut-kidney axis in diabetes and diabetic nephropathy
美国当代酒精相关死亡率的负担和趋势是否存在性别差异？一组研究人员分析了美国与酒精相关的死亡率的趋势和差异，考虑了性别、年龄、种族、民族和地理区域等因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Are-there-sex-based-differences-in-the-contemporary-burden-and-trends-of-alcohol-lated-mortality-in-the-美国.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Are-there-sex-based-differences-in-the-contemporary-burden-and-trends-of-alcohol-lated-mortality-in-the- US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ecf87d1-e41b-499e-af46-4265f0dff21d Wed, 02 Aug 2023 08:17:00 -0400 Are there sex-based differences in the contemporary burden and trends of alcohol-related mortality in the US?
将心脏代谢危险因素与重症 COVID-19 联系起来的中介因素有哪些？研究人员进行了一项全基因组关联研究，以探讨生物标志物水平是否与 COVID-19 住院治疗存在因果关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/What-are-the-mediators-linking-cardiometabolic-risk-factors-and-severe-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/What-are-the-mediators-linking-cardiometabolic-risk-factors-and-severe-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52b995d5-c713-4cfe-887c-3731270d2449 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 08:11:00 -0400 What are the mediators linking cardiometabolic risk factors and severe COVID-19?
运动对过度肥胖儿童的心脏代谢和心理健康有何平行影响？研究人员对 ActiveBrains 随机临床试验 (RCT) 进行了二次分析，以了解 20 周的锻炼计划如何影响儿童健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/What-are-the-parallel-effects-of-exercise-on-cardiometabolic-and-mental-health-in-children-with-an-excess- of-adiposity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/What-are-the-parallel-effects-of-exercise-on-cardiometabolic-and-mental-health-in-children-with-an-excess- of-adiposity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=093ded7b-f652-4ae1-9a03-856b5ceedbd7 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 08:02:00 -0400 What are the parallel effects of exercise on cardiometabolic and mental health in children with an excess of adiposity?
用于乳房筛查的舒适、可穿戴超声乳腺贴片在最近的一项研究中，研究人员开发了一种用于乳房筛查的舒适超声乳腺贴片 (cUSBr-Patch)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/A-comfortable-wearable-ultrasound-breast-patch-for-breast-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/A-comfortable-wearable-ultrasound-breast-patch-for-breast-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3470a20-2ed0-43a1-a51a-5d5c88079f6e Wed, 02 Aug 2023 07:55:00 -0400 A comfortable, wearable ultrasound breast patch for breast screening
地中海饮食如何影响非裔美国肥胖成年人的肠道微生物组和认知表现？地中海饮食（Med Diet）和有意减肥（IWL）对肠道微生物群的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/How-does-the-Mediterranean-Diet-impact-the-gut-microbiome-and-cognitive-performance-African-American-obese-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/How-does-the-Mediterranean-Diet-impact-the-gut-microbiome-and-cognitive-performance-African-American-obese-adults.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=236ef147-4ab0-4cb3-afb3-7e534feecd55 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 07:53:00 -0400 How does the Mediterranean Diet impact the gut microbiome and cognitive performance African American obese adults?
维生素 D 能否对减少皮质病理、氧化应激和神经丝轻链血清水平产生积极作用？研究人员使用已建立的皮质炎症脱髓鞘小鼠模型来研究维生素 D 的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Can-vitamin-D-have-positive-effects-on-reducing-cortical-pathology-oxygen-stress-and-neurofilament-light-chain-serum-级别.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Can-vitamin-D-have-positive-effects-on-reducing-cortical-pathology-oxygen-stress-and-neurofilament-light-chain-serum- level.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ae497a3-687b-442e-aa9e-cb4c58ec703a Wed, 02 Aug 2023 07:07:00 -0400 Can vitamin D have positive effects on reducing cortical pathology, oxidative stress, and neurofilament light chain serum levels?
增强临床医生决策：结构化数据共享网络推动质量改进研究人员评估临床医生之间结构化信息共享网络提高临床医生诊断准确性和治疗决策的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Enhanced-clinician-decision-making-structed-data-sharing-networks-drive-quality-improvement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Enhanced-clinician-decision-making-structed-data-sharing-networks-drive-quality-improvement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2bb7c71-6907-4380-9809-60562a452bcd Wed, 02 Aug 2023 06:54:00 -0400 Enhanced clinician decision-making: structured data-sharing networks drive quality improvement
药用植物对癌症肠道微生物群的影响研究人员评估了药用植物、肠道微生物组和癌症之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/The-impact-of-medicinal-plants-on-the-gut-microbiome-in-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/The-impact-of-medicinal-plants-on-the-gut-microbiome-in-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=720123bf-9d8f-4da2-acca-beedf1d37ecb Wed, 02 Aug 2023 06:50:00 -0400 The impact of medicinal plants on the gut microbiome in cancer
长期、每日小剂量阿司匹林治疗会影响中风或脑出血的发生率吗？研究人员发现，服用阿司匹林的老年人颅内出血的风险增加 38%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Does-long-term-daily-low-dose-aspirin-treatment-affect-the-incidence-of-中风-or-intracerebral-bleeding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Does-long-term-daily-low-dose-aspirin-treatment-affect-the-incidence-of-中风-or-intracerebral-bleeding.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d4906c9-f9a0-49eb-a678-d64961bc6310 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 06:43:00 -0400 Does long-term, daily low-dose aspirin treatment affect the incidence of stroke or intracerebral bleeding?
